_header: When Jesu Christ our lord all-wielding
_description: Gospel for the Nineteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When ihesus crist oure lord alweldandHad wroght wonders in diuers land…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …In þe sext feri may men seBifor þe fest of þe trinite
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ascendens ihesus crist in nauicul.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Exposicio super eundem fferia iiii proxima sequente. Dominica xix secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 125rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.144-146.
